title: Barbecued rosemary chicken breasts
ingredients: ['8 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons freshly minced rosemary', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/8 teaspoon salt, or to tatse', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts']
